body: We have a similar mechanism on Linux etc with the "//sys" vs "//sysnb" comments which generate calls to either https://golang.org/pkg/syscall/#Syscall (maybe blocking) vs https://golang.org/pkg/syscall/#RawSyscall (not blocking). Looks like `entersyscallblock` is a "definitely blocking" option. Should that be exposed as an option in pkg syscall?
